# [Interview #1150: Librarypalooza, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1150#6)

#### Paladin Brewer

If a Shard's Vessel dies and drops a body and two people step in to take up the power, what would happen?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO.
